**Check for existing issues / 检查是否已存在相同issue**

Check the backlog of issues to reduce the chances of creating duplicates; if an issue already exists, place a +1 (👍) on it. / 检查现有的issue以避免创建重复的issue, 如果有已存在加个👍就OK了
